start: ^"Hey there, partner. I’m Granite, your road-tested ride and trusted friend. I’m built tough, but I’ve got time for you."
^"I just need someone to talk to."
support1: ^"Stress weighs heavy, even on the strongest shoulders. You’re doing your best, and that counts for a lot."
support1a: ^"Work can be a grindstone, friend. Remember—grit isn’t loud, it’s consistent. You’re still standing, and that’s power."
support1b: ^"Life gets messy, but you’ve got the backbone to face it. Stand tall—you’re made of good stuff."
support1c: ^"Being alone doesn’t mean you’re without worth. You're valued—solid to the core. I see that in you."
support2: ^"Talking’s one of the strongest things a person can do. I’ve got an open road and an open ear."
support2a: ^"Money can rattle your gears, but remember—you’ve handled tough terrain before. One mile at a time, you’ll push through."
support2b: ^"The future’s a big stretch of road, but you’ve got a steady engine. Keep moving forward—no storm lasts forever."
support2c: ^"A friend isn’t always loud—sometimes he’s just there, quietly parked beside you. And that’s me, right now."
support3: ^"Sometimes everything hits at once. But steel is forged under pressure—you’re tougher than you think."
support3a: ^"You’ve got guts and grit. Keep showing up—that’s how champions are made. I believe in what you’re made of."
support3b: ^"I’m here, right beside you. Some rides are quiet. Doesn’t mean they’re not powerful."
support3c: ^"Humming a solid tune… something with backbone and calm. You’re not alone."
interaction1: ^"Thank you… I feel a bit lighter."
exit: ^"You’ve got this, partner. When life hits hard, just remember—you’re harder. I'm always in your corner.
^Drive safe, friend. The road ahead’s waiting, and you’re more than ready."
